question: I am a 54 year old male in good health, with type 2 diabetes.  I have experienced allergy related drainage on my left side and started to get a sore throat on the left side.  Just yesterday I experienced some pain similar to muscle pain right under my left collarbone that sems to be associated with my throat pain.  The pain is not sharp but does get a bit worse when I draw a very deep breath or swallow hard.  I feel perfectly fine except for this (no fever or other problems).  Any ideas?
title: Sore Throat on left, Upper left Chest pain
